string-array.name: valores_topics
string-array.item: Mechanization of Mathematics with special emphasis on Algebraic Geometry and Algebraic Topology
Computer Algebra Systems and Automated Theorem Provers
Integration of Logical Reasoning and Computer Algebra
Combining of Logics, including fibring logics, unified logics, logical fibering and similar approaches
Non-classical logics computation such as non-monotonic reasoning, uncertainty, revision and beliefs
New approaches to AI such as universal AI, heuristic approaches and relevant Turing machines, probabilistic Turing Machines
Foundations and Complexity of Symbolic Programming Languages for Symbolic Computation
Symbolic Computations for Expert Systems and Machine Learning
Mathematical computations and the Internet of Things
Engineering, Industrial and Operation Research Applications
Epistemology and philosophy of Symbolic Mathematical Computing
Emerging fields of computational AI such as biocomputing and quantum computing
